text:
On this #NationalDayOfPrayer, join me in prayer to ask God to:
- Please keep us safe from COVID19
- Protect Ruth Bader Ginsburg
- Unite all DEMs before November
- Remove the plague currently residing at 1600 Pennsylvania Ave.

AMEN.🙏🙏
